name: TogglTimer
0:
”Alexa, ask toggle timer to start timer on project A”
”Alexa, ask toggle timer how I spent yesterday”
”Alexa, open toggle timer”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: toggle timer
des: A 3rd-party skill for the Toggl time tracker. You can start and stop time entries, ask for the status of current entry and summary of a specific day. You can also say "add to project ABC" to add the current running entry to a project.
